attributes.action: No tax on overtime in England
attributes.additional_details: The threshold for income is unbearable. As for most of middle class we will hit 40% barrier.
attributes.background: It's enough to tax base rate. It's fair to tax on basic income. Whatever is over, should be entirely granted to the worker for his hard work. Take example from US.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petition, which calls for similar action:

Review overtime taxation to make it fairer for UK workers
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/752335
